post.author: Site Admin
post.content: A college student was trying to convince his father that he needed a jogging suit for jogging around campus. “Why can't you just run in your other clothes?”his father reasoned. “I have to run in a jogging suit,”he explained. “otherwise no one knows I'm exercising -- they just think I'm late for class!”
post.title: 조깅복을 입어야 하는 이유
